name: Tankscape
description:
A game made in 7 days for the Bored Pixels Jam with a team composed of 5 members.

Tankscape is a game where you try to escape from an exploding space station. You need to collect 3 fuel tanks and go to the right side of the station. The space station is procedurally generated. Activate terminals to win more time.

Press Space to switch between colors and do a left click to jump.
